module.name: containment_of_individual_product
module.keywords: module, containment, individual, product, process plant

purpose.p: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module that records containment relationships between individual products.
The containing product encloses the contained product to protect the contained product or to prevent the contained product from moving or dispersing.

example.p: The tank with tag T_27 is an individual product. The batch of fluid with identifier 2001-10-30/B2 is an individual product.
The relationship between tank T_27 and batch 2001-10-30/B2, that indicates the batch of fluid is contained within the tank, is a containment of individual product.

li.p: a relationship between one individual product and another that indicates one is contained by the other.

li.note: Class of containment of product is within the scope of the Class_of_containment_of_product application module.

li.p: classification of a containment relationship between products;
li.note: Classification of containment of product is within the scope of the Product_structure_and_classification application module.
Connections between individual products are within the scope of the Connection_of_individual_product application module.

uof.name: Containment_of_individual_product
uof.description: The Containment_of_individual_product UoF identifies a containment of individual product relationship and defines the individual products that are the contained and the container.
